name: Roulette Rumble
description:
Roulette Rumble is a top-down action game made for Juicy Jam #1. The goal is to defend the slot machine in the middle from the cute but terrifying enemies. Dash around to avoid damage and protect the slot machine with your life!  When the dust settles, you are presented with a wheel to spin. Each section on the wheel is a specific tier of power-ups for you and your enemies. After their spin, the player is presented with a choice of three randomly coupled player and enemy upgrades based on the tier they received. The more you play, the stronger you and your enemies get. How long can you last? 

~ Controls ~

WASD - Move

Left Click - Attack

Mouse - Aim

Space Bar - Dash
